Well Howdy!

I'm Chatranga Ranasingha, a twenty-something guy from Hela-Diva (popularly known as Sri Lanka). I'm a guy that's crazy about anything to do with computers (although, wo aint' now?), don't ask me to give you specifics.

Longtime OS/2 fan, and fanatic of UNIX/Linux and the Open Source Movement.
